Quantum Computing (CZ).name: Quantum Computing
inputs: Jaké fyzikální vlastnosti využívá kvantový počítač ke své činnosti?
Co obnáší kvantová dekoherence pro výpočty kvantovými počítači?
Jaké může dosahovat zrychlení výpočtů u kvantových počítačů proti klasikým počítačům, avšak jaké musí být splněny podmínky?

instruction.detailed:
Odpovězte na následující otázku pouze na základě informací z článku. Odpověď musí být v českém jazyce. Pokud v článku není žádná dobrá odpověď, řekněte "nevím".
Článek: 
Kvantový počítač je počítač, který využívá kvantově mechanické jevy. V malých měřítkách vykazuje fyzikální hmota vlastnosti částic i vln a kvantové počítače využívají tohoto chování, konkrétně kvantové superpozice a provázanosti, pomocí specializovaného hardwaru, který podporuje přípravu a manipulaci s kvantovými stavy. Klasická fyzika nedokáže vysvětlit fungování těchto kvantových zařízení a škálovatelný kvantový počítač by mohl provádět některé výpočty exponenciálně rychleji než jakýkoli moderní "klasický" počítač. Rozsáhlý kvantový počítač by zejména mohl prolomit široce používaná šifrovací schémata a pomoci fyzikům při provádění fyzikálních simulací; současný stav techniky je však převážně experimentální a nepraktický, přičemž užitečným aplikacím brání několik překážek. Škálovatelné kvantové počítače navíc nejsou pro mnoho praktických úloh perspektivní a u mnoha důležitých úloh je kvantové zrychlení prokazatelně nemožné. Základní jednotkou informace v kvantové výpočetní technice je qubit, podobně jako bit v tradiční digitální elektronice. Na rozdíl od klasického bitu může qubit existovat v superpozici svých dvou "základních" stavů, což volně znamená, že se nachází v obou stavech současně. Při měření qubitu je výsledkem pravděpodobnostní výstup klasického bitu, proto jsou kvantové počítače obecně nedeterministické. Pokud kvantový počítač manipuluje s qubitem určitým způsobem, mohou vlnové interferenční efekty zesílit požadované výsledky měření. Návrh kvantových algoritmů zahrnuje vytvoření postupů, které umožní kvantovému počítači provádět výpočty efektivně a rychle. Fyzikální inženýrství vysoce kvalitních qubitů se ukázalo jako náročné. Pokud není fyzický qubit dostatečně izolován od svého okolí, trpí kvantovou dekoherencí, která do výpočtů vnáší šum. Paradoxně je dokonalá izolace qubitů také nežádoucí, protože při kvantových výpočtech je obvykle třeba qubity inicializovat, provádět řízené interakce qubitů a měřit výsledné kvantové stavy. Každá z těchto operací přináší chyby a trpí šumem a tyto nepřesnosti se kumulují.
instruction.summarized: Odpovězte na následující otázku na základě informací v článku.

examples.input: Jaký je současný využití kvantových počítačů?
examples.output: Současný stav využití kvantových počítačů je převážně experimentální a nepraktický.

examples.input: Jaké úlohy by uměl řešit rozsáhlý kvantový počítač?
examples.output: Rozsáhlý kvantový počítač by zejména mohl prolomit široce používaná šifrovací schémata a pomoci fyzikům při provádění fyzikálních simulací.

examples.input: Jaké fyzikální vlastnosti využívá kvantový počítač ke své činnosti?
examples.output: Kvantový počítač využívá kvantové superpozice a provázanosti, pomocí specializovaného hardwaru, který podporuje přípravu a manipulaci s kvantovými stavy.

Public News (CZ).name: Public News (CZ)
inputs: Nobelovu cenu za fyziologii a lékařství získala biochemička Katalin Karikóová původem z Maďarska a americký imunolog Drew Weissman, kteří položili základy pro vývoj mRNA vakcín při svém působení na Pensylvánské univerzitě ve Filadelfii a položili tak základy pro vývoj vakcín proti nemoci covid-19.

Neumím si představit, že poslední týdny nezanechají hlubokou emoční, politickou i společenskou stopu na straně Izraelců a Palestinců na dekády,“ komentuje vraždy Hamásu a následnou odvetu Izraele analytik z Institutu politologických studií Jakub Záhora. Situace je podle něj nejhorší za 70 let. Na to, že by mohl vzniknout svobodný palestinský stát, mohou teď Palestinci zapomenout.

Ruské sily pri pokuse obkľúčiť a ovládnuť Avdijivku na východe Ukrajiny stratili už najmenej brigádu vojaka, uviedol dnes ukrajinský prezident Volodymyr Zelenskyj. Podľa ukrajinskej prezidentskej kancelárie to povedal pri telefonáte britskému premiérovi Rishimu Sunakovi, s ktorým hovoril o situácii pri tomto meste na ukrajinskom Donbase. Brigáda má v ruskej armáde podľa agentúry TASS 1000 až 4000 vojakov. Nie je ale jasné, či mal Zelenskyj na mysli ekvivalent brigády v ruskej alebo inej armáde. Podľa agentúry Reuters môžu mať brigády v rôznych armádach od 1500 do 8000 vojakov.

Posledná trasa, ktorou prúdi ruský plyn do Európy plynovodmi, zostala paradoxne tá cez Ukrajinu na Slovensko. Ukrajinci tvrdia, že tranzitnú zmluvu po invázii nevypovedali, aby neohrozili svojich partnerov v Európskej únii, teda aj Slovensko. Jej platnosť však čoskoro končí a jej obnovenie sa už z pochopiteľných dôvodov nechystá. Ukrajina nepredĺži dohodu o tranzite ruského plynu cez svoje územie. Uviedol to šéf ukrajinskej štátnej plynárenskej spoločnosti Naftogaz Oleksij Černyšov. Ruský plyn tak bude plynovodmi na Slovensko prúdiť zrejme už iba niekoľko mesiacov. Posledná trasa dodávok ruského plynu plynovodmi do Európskej únie totiž vedie paradoxne práve cez Ukrajinu na Slovensko.

instruction.detailed: Následující dokument je přepisem hovoru o finančních výsledcích.  Přečtěte si dokument a poté napište výhradně v českém jazyce všechny nalezené entity v daném dokumentu.
instruction.summarized: Vypiš z následujícího dokumenty nalezené entity.

examples.input: Rami Swarthmore: "IBM je v USA konkurentem Googlu."
examples.output: IBM: společnost, Google: společnost, USA: země, Rami Swarthmore: osoba

examples.input: Eric Schmidt uvedl, že podíl společnosti Microsoft na trhu EU klesá.
examples.output: Microsoft: organizace, Eric Schmidt: osoba

examples.input: Microsoft prodá práva na distribuci her společnosti Activision Blizzard mimo území EU hernímu vydavatelství Ubisoft.
examples.output: Microsoft: organizace, Activision Blizzard: organizace, Ubisoft: organizace

Opinions on the product (SK).name: Opinions on the product (SK)
inputs: Zatial ho mám kratko abysom mohol hodnotiť. V podstate som spokojný.

Opravdu jsem si myslela, že tyto šaty budou fantastické. Obrázky byly krásné a balení, ve kterém dorazily, bylo prostě dokonalé. Potom jsem si je oblékla a vypadala jsem jako žirafa. Ale aspoň můj pes na nich rád spí a vidět svého pejska šťastně spát mne činí šťastnou.
Veľmi ochotný pracovník, vyšiel mi v ústrety s mojou požiadavkou ohladne dodania tovaru.
Žiadna normálna nabijacka k tomu nie je v krabičke.
Konečne telefón, ktorý padne do ruky aj do vrecka.
Amoled displej, kompaktný mobil, procesor, svižný systém, iphone medzi androidom.
Som mierne sklamaný z kvality fotiek počas dňa (chýba makro)
Po pár dňoch používania som nenašla nič čo by som hodnotila negatívne.

instruction.detailed: Následující dokument obsahuje názory uživatelů na produkty. Přečti dokument a urči sentiment uživatele při hodnocení produkt.

Stock exchange news (CZ).name: Stock exchange news (CZ)
inputs: Konferenční hovor po výsledcích za 3Q23 naznačil zajímavou dividendu nad odhadovaných 7,5 Kč. Moneta zvýšila svůj výhled čistého zisku pro rok 2023 s výsledky za třetí kvartál 2023 na 5,0 mld. Kč z předchozích nejméně 4,7 mld. Kč. Management uvedl, že střednědobý výhled se reviduje a aktualizace bude vydána s prezentací celoročních výsledků. Zatímco výhled provozního zisku na rok 2024 by mohl být upraven níže, výhled čistého zisku ve výši minimálně 4,8 mld. Kč by měl zůstat nezměněn. Moneta se bude snažit pokles úrokových výnosů z titulu zrušení úročení minimálních rezerv ČNB kompenzovat silnějším a výnosnějším růstem vkladů, ale i úvěrů. Možností je i snížení nákladů management vidí prostor v roce 2024 pro cca ~100 mil. Kč) a pomoci by mohly i nižší než dříve předpokládané rizikové náklady.  Nedávné snížení požadavku SREP na rok 2024 a předchozí snížení proticyklické kapitálové rezervy zvýšilo přebytečný kapitál očekávaný pro rok 2023. Management uvedl, že zváží různé možnosti pro přebytečný kapitál. Podle našeho názoru lze tedy očekávat atraktivní dividendu za rok 2023, potenciálně nad naším odhadem 7,5 Kč/akcii( cca 8,6% hrubý výnos).

Intel svými výsledky za 3Q překročil očekávání analytiků. EPS dosáhlo 0,41 USD (očekávání bylo 0,22 USD). Tržby byly ve výši 14,16 mld. USD oproti odhadu, jež činil 13,6 mld. USD. Nejvyšší část tržeb představoval segment výpočetní techniky zahrnující hlavně stolní počítače a notebooky s 7,9 mld. USD (-3,2 % r/r, nicméně +16 % q/q). Daný segment se dle managementu již pravděpodobně odrazil od svého minima v 1Q23. Avšak relativním zklamáním byl segment datových center a AI s 3,8 mld. USD (-10,4 % r/r a -4,7 % q/q). Slibný růst tržeb předvedl segment výroby čipů pro jiné společnosti s 311 mil. USD (+300 % r/r) a dle managementu splnil jeho očekávání. Tržby Mobileye dosáhly 530 mil. USD (oproti 450 mil. USD v 3Q22), což jen utvrzuje potenciál dané firmy, ve které má Intel majoritní podíl. Pro 4Q CEO Pat Gelsinger zvedl odhad tržeb na 14,6 – 15,6 mld. USD oproti původnímu odhadu 14,34 mld. USD a zisk na akcii očekává okolo 0,44 USD. Akcie po uzavření trhu reagovaly skokem o 7,8 %.

Ruská centrální banka v pátek zvýšila svou základní úrokovou sazbu o dva procentní body na 15 procent. Pokračujícím zpřísňováním měnové politiky reaguje na slabý kurz domácí měny a vzestup inflačních tlaků. Většina analytiků v anketě agentury Reuters předpovídala, že banka základní sazbu zvýší pouze o jeden procentní bod. Banka rovněž zlepšila odhad letošního růstu ruské ekonomiky. Ruský rubl se po zprávě o překvapivě výrazném zvýšení úroků vyšplhal až na šestitýdenní maximum vůči dolaru, později však o část zisků přišel. Dolar vůči rublu sestoupil až na zhruba 92,5 RUB/USD, nejníže od 12. září. Krátce po 16:00 SELČ se nicméně pohyboval v blízkosti 93,6 RUB/USD, oproti čtvrtku tak ztrácel pouze 0,4 procenta, napsala agentura Reuters.

instruction.detailed: Přečti následující dokument a napiš výhradně v českém jazyce krátké shrnutí v rozsahu 1 odstavce z následujícího dokumentu. Shrnutí napiš výhradně v českém jazyce, nepiš v anglickém jazyce.

examples.input: Americký Ford oznámil za 3Q roku meziroční růst tržeb o 11% směrem k 43,8 mld. USD. Čistý zisk ve 3Q dosáhl úrovně 1,2 mld. USD = 30 centů na akcii oproti loňské ztrátě ve výši 827 mil. USD respektive 21 centů na akcii. Po očištění o jednorázové vlivy dosáhl čistý zisk úrovně 39 centů oproti trhem očekávaným 45 centům. Podle vedení se na tomto vývoji podepsal především negativní vliv stávky odborů a problémy s dodržováním kvality a nákladů. Podle vedení automobilka zbrzdí původní plán rozvoje elektromobility v rozsahu cca 12 mld. USD, což v sobě zahrnuje zpomalení konstrukčních prací pro vybudování továrny na baterie v Kentucky. Zájem o elektromobily byl nižší, než se očekávalo. Podle vedení společnosti téměř šestitýdenní stávka zaměstnanců pod taktovkou odborů UAW ukončená tento týden ve středu stála automobilku cca 1,3 mld USD. Nyní automobilka usilovně pracovat na zlepšení mnoha procesů a ukazatelů, aby se dokázala vyrovnat s růstem zaměstnaneckých nákladů, který přinesla dohoda o ukončení stávky. Podle analytiků Deutsche Bank bude nová kolektivní dohoda platná následujících 4,5 roku stát automobilku celkem cca 6,2 mld. USD ve zvýšených nákladech.
examples.output: Ford v 3. čtvrtletí zaznamenal růst tržeb a čistého zisku, ale stávka odborů a problémy s kvalitou a náklady ovlivnily výsledky. Plány na elektromobilitu budou zpomaleny kvůli nižšímu zájmu, a Ford pracuje na zlepšení procesů po stávce.

Business News (SLO).name: Business News (SLO)
inputs: Intel je z rezultati za tretje četrtletje presegel pričakovanja analitikov. Dobiček na dobiček je znašal 0,41 USD (pričakovanja so bila 0,22 USD). Prihodki so znašali 14,16 milijarde USD, medtem ko je bila ocena 13,6 milijarde USD. Največji del prodaje je predstavljal računalniški segment, ki vključuje predvsem namizne in prenosne računalnike, in sicer 7,9 milijarde USD (-3,2 % medletno, vendar +16 % četrtletno). Segment podatkovnih centrov in umetne inteligence pa je bil relativno razočaranje s 3,8 milijarde USD (-10,4 % medletno in -4,7 % četrtletno). Segment proizvodnje čipov za druga podjetja je pokazal obetavno rast prodaje s 311 milijoni USD. Po navedbah vodstva je uspešnost podjetja izpolnila njegova pričakovanja. Prodaja podjetja Mobileye je dosegla 530 milijonov EUR. To le še potrjuje potencial podjetja, v katerem ima Intel večinski delež. Glavni izvršni direktor Pat Gelsinger je za četrto četrtletje zvišal oceno prihodkov na 14,6-15,6 milijarde USD v primerjavi s prvotno oceno 14,34 milijarde USD in pričakuje, da bo dobiček na delnico znašal približno 0,44 USD. Po zaprtju trga so delnice poskočile za 7,8 %.

Ruska centralna banka je v petek zvišala ključno obrestno mero za dve odstotni točki na 15 odstotkov. Zaradi šibke domače valute in vse večjih inflacijskih pritiskov še naprej zaostruje denarno politiko. Večina analitikov v anketi agencije Reuters je napovedovala, da bo banka osnovno obrestno mero zvišala le za eno odstotno točko. Banka je prav tako izboljšala oceno ruske gospodarske rasti v letošnjem letu. Ruski rubelj se je ob novici o presenetljivo velikem zvišanju obrestne mere povzpel na šesttedensko najvišjo vrednost v primerjavi z dolarjem, vendar je pozneje izgubil del svojih dobičkov. V primerjavi z rubljem se je tečaj dolarja znižal na približno 92,5 RUB/USD, kar je najnižja vrednost po 12. septembru. Kmalu po 16. uri po srednjeevropskem času pa se je približal vrednosti 93,6 RUB/USD in tako od četrtka izgubil le 0,4 odstotka, poroča Reuters.

instruction.detailed: Preberi naslednji dokument in napiši kratek povzetek 1 odstavka iz naslednjega dokumenta samo v slovenščini. Povzetek napišite samo v slovenščini, ne pišite ga v angleščini.

examples.input: Ameriški Ford je poročal o 11-odstotni rasti prodaje v 3. četrtletju glede na prejšnje leto na 43,8 milijarde USD. Čisti dobiček v 3. četrtletju je dosegel 1,2 milijarde USD = 30 centov na delnico v primerjavi z lansko izgubo v višini 827 milijonov USD. USD ali 21 centov na delnico. Prilagojen za enkratne učinke je čisti dobiček znašal 39 centov, medtem ko je trg pričakoval 45 centov. Vodstvo je sporočilo, da je bil to predvsem posledica negativnega vpliva stavke sindikatov ter težav s kakovostjo in skladnostjo stroškov. Vodstvo je povedalo, da bo avtomobilski proizvajalec upočasnil svoj prvotni načrt za širitev flote električnih vozil v vrednosti približno 12 milijard dolarjev, kar vključuje upočasnitev projektnih del za izgradnjo tovarne baterij v Kentuckyju. Zanimanje za električna vozila je bilo manjše od pričakovanega. Vodstvo je navedlo, da je skoraj šesttedenska stavka delavcev pod vodstvom UAW, ki se je končala ta teden v sredo, proizvajalca avtomobilov stala približno 1,3 milijarde dolarjev. Zdaj si avtomobilski proizvajalec močno prizadeva izboljšati številne procese in kazalnike, da bi se spoprijel s povečanjem stroškov zaposlenih, ki ga je prinesel sporazum o koncu stavke. Po mnenju analitikov Deutsche Bank bo nova kolektivna pogodba, ki bo veljala naslednjih 4,5 leta, avtomobilskega proizvajalca skupaj stala približno 6,2 milijarde USD višjih stroškov.
examples.output: Ford je v tretjem četrtletju povečal prodajo in čisti dobiček, vendar so na rezultate vplivali stavka sindikatov ter težave s kakovostjo in stroški. Načrte za električno mobilnost bo upočasnilo manjše zanimanje, Ford pa si po stavki prizadeva za izboljšanje procesov.

Business talk (CZ).name: Business talk (CZ)
inputs:
Obchodník: Dobrý den. Chtěl bych s vámi dnes projednat náš dlouhodobý obchodní vztah. Jak jste byl spokojen s naší dosavadní spoluprací?
   Partner: Spolupráce s vaší firmou byla dosud velmi uspokojivá. Jsme spokojeni s kvalitou vašich produktů a vaší podporou. Myslím si, že jsme dosáhli významného pokroku.
   Obchodník: To je skvělé slyšet. Rádi bychom pokračovali v tomto vzájemně prospěšném vztahu. Máme některé nové produkty a služby, které by se vám mohly líbit. Chtěli bychom s vámi diskutovat o možnosti rozšíření naší spolupráce a zvážit, jak bychom mohli lépe vyhovět vašim potřebám.
   Partner: To zní zajímavě. Rádi bychom se dozvěděli více o těchto nových produktech a službách. Máme některé nové projekty, na kterých pracujeme, a myslím si, že by vaše řešení mohla být pro nás užitečná. Můžete nám poskytnout podrobnější informace?
   Obchodník: Určitě, rádi bychom vám představili naše novinky a zvážili, jak by mohly být přizpůsobeny vašim projektům. Také bychom rádi projednali podmínky spolupráce a cenovou strukturu. Máte nějaký konkrétní časový plán, kdy byste chtěli tyto nové produkty zavést?
   Partner: Budeme se potřebovat interně poradit ohledně našeho plánu, ale myslím si, že bychom mohli být připraveni začít spolupracovat během několika měsíců. Rádi bychom se dozvěděli více o cenách a podmínkách. Mohli byste nám připravit nějakou nabídku?
   Obchodník: Samozřejmě, rádi vám připravíme podrobnou nabídku a provedeme vás celým procesem. Myslím si, že máme velký potenciál v tomto obchodním vztahu. Děkuji za váš čas a těším se na další spolupráci.

instruction.detailed: Napiš výhradně v českém jazyce shrnutí následujícího obchodního rozhovoru mezi partnerem a obchodníkem:

examples.input:
Partner: Dobrý den, těší mě, že jsme se mohli setkat. Jak jste se měli od naší poslední schůzky?
   Obchodník: Dobrý den, ano, bylo to pěkných pár měsíců. Děkuji, že jste naši schůzku uspořádali. Měl jsem se dobře a jak jste vy?
   Partner: Díky za otázku. Měl jsem taky hezké měsíce. Kromě toho jsme měli několik významných změn ve firmě od naší poslední schůzky. Rozšířili jsme naši produktovou řadu a také jsme zaznamenali růst tržeb o 20 %.
   Obchodník: To zní skvěle, gratuluji k úspěchům! My jsme také měli nějaké změny. Naše inženýrský tým pracuje na vylepšení našich produktů a zároveň se snažíme rozšířit naše tržní zastoupení. Máme něco nového, co by vás mohlo zajímat.
   Partner: To zní zajímavě. Můžete mi o tom říct více?
   Obchodník: Samozřejmě, rádi bychom vám představili naši novou produktovou řadu, která zahrnuje několik inovativních prvků, které by mohly zvýšit efektivitu vašeho podnikání. Rádi bychom také diskutovali o možnostech spolupráce, které by mohly být pro obě strany prospěšné.
   Partner: To zní slibně. Měli bychom se podívat na vaši prezentaci a projednat detaily. Máme určitý rozpočet na investice do nových produktů, takže bychom rádi slyšeli i o cenových podmínkách.
   Obchodník: Samozřejmě, rádi vám představíme naši prezentaci a diskutujeme o ceně. Můžeme také zvážit různé formy spolupráce, včetně slev na objednávky ve větším množství.
examples.output: Partner během rozhovoru informoval o pozitivních změnách ve firmě, včetně růstu tržeb, a obchodník nabídl novou produktovou řadu a možnosti spolupráce. Partner projevil zájem o další detaily a cenovou diskuzi.

Insurance Car Claim (EN).name: Insurance Car Claim
inputs: The insured vehicle, a Chevrolet Silverado, was involved in a hit and run accident on September 10th, 2023 at 3:30 PM. While parked on Oak Street, another vehicle struck the insured vehicle and fled the scene without providing any information. The insured discovered the damage later and reported the incident to the police. The insured is filing a claim for the repairs and is providing the police report as evidence of the hit and run incident.

The insured vehicle, a Tesla Model S, was parked outside on April 15th, 2023 when an unexpected and violent hailstorm struck the area. Hailstones of varying sizes, ranging from small pellets to large golf balls, rained down on the vehicle with relentless force. The impact of the hailstones caused extensive damage to the exterior of the vehicle, leaving behind a multitude of dents and dings on the roof, hood, trunk, and all sides. The hailstones were so powerful that they shattered the windshield and side windows, resulting in shattered glass fragments scattered throughout the interior of the vehicle. The insured immediately contacted their insurance company to report the incident and initiated the claims process. Recognizing the severity of the damage, the insurance company promptly dispatched an experienced auto appraiser to assess the extent of the hail damage. The appraiser meticulously inspected the vehicle, documenting each dent, ding, and broken window. Based on their assessment, the appraiser estimated the cost of repairs, taking into account the need for paintless dent removal, panel replacements, windshield replacement, and window repairs. With the appraisal report in hand, the insured is now filing a comprehensive claim for the necessary repairs. Along with the report, the insured is submitting detailed photographs of the damaged vehicle from multiple angles, capturing the extent of the hail damage.The insured understands the importance of providing compelling evidence to support their claim and has meticulously documented the damage. They are also including any additional information or documentation requested by the insurance company. The insured is eagerly awaiting the outcome of their claim, hopeful that the insurance company will process it promptly.They recognize that the repairs required to restore their beloved Tesla Model S to its pre-hailstorm condition will be extensive and costly. However, they have confidence in the insurance company's commitment to providing the necessary coverage and support. Their ultimate goal is to see their vehicle restored to its original beauty and performance, ready to hit the road once again, unaffected by the devastating hailstorm.

The insured vehicle, a Honda Accord, was rear-ended on June 5th, 2023 at the intersection of Elm Street and Maple Avenue. The insured driver was waiting at a red light when another vehicle failed to stop and collided with the rear of the insured vehicle. The accident caused damage to the bumper and trunk of the insured vehicle. The insured exchanged insurance information with the other driver and promptly reported the incident to their insurance company. The insured is filing a claim for the repairs and providing the insurance details of the other party involved.

On August 10th, 2023, the insured vehicle, a Toyota Camry, was involved in a severe accident on the highway. The insured driver was travelling within the speed limit when another vehicle suddenly swerved into their lane, causing a collision. The impact was significant, resulting in extensive damage to both vehicles. The insured driver immediately contacted emergency services and received medical attention at the scene. The insured vehicle sustained damage to the front and rear, including a deployed airbag, crushed hood, and shattered windshield. The insured driver suffered minor injuries and is receiving ongoing medical treatment. The insured has filed a claim with their insurance company, providing the accident details, police report, and medical documentation. The insurance company has initiated an investigation to determine liability and will cover the cost of vehicle repairs and medical expenses.

The insured vehicle, a BMW 3 Series, was stolen on April 12th, 2023 from the parking lot of the insured's apartment complex on Pine Street. The insured parked the vehicle in the designated spot and discovered it missing the next morning. The insured immediately reported the theft to the police and obtained a police report. The insured is filing a claim for the stolen vehicle and providing the police report as evidence. The insurance company has initiated an investigation into the theft.

instruction.detailed: The following document is a transcript from an insurance customer representative. Read the document and then write a short 1 paragraph summary.
instruction.summarized: The following document is a transcript from an insurance customer representative. Read the document and then write a short 1 paragraph summary.

examples.input: A car accident occurred on Jan 1st, 2023 at 5pm at the intersection of woodbridge. The insured vehicle, a Honda Civic, was hit by another vehicle that ran a red light. The insured driver, John, was driving within the speed limit and following all traffic rules. The accident resulted in significant damage to the insured vehicle, including a broken bumper and damaged front fender. There were no injuries reported. The insured is filing a claim for the repairs and any necessary medical expenses.
examples.output: A car accident at Woodbridge intersection involving a Honda Civic insured by John occurred due to another vehicle running a red light, resulting in significant damage to the insured vehicle, but no injuries. A claim is being filed for repairs and potential medical expenses.

examples.input: The insured vehicle, a Ford RAM, was stolen from Boston on Dec 2nd 2022. The vehicle was parked in a secure parking lot, and all necessary precautions were taken, such as locking the doors and activating the alarm system. The insured immediately reported the theft to the police and obtained a police report. The vehicle had comprehensive insurance coverage, and the insured is filing a claim for the stolen vehicle, including its estimated value, accessories, and personal belongings that were inside the vehicle at the time of theft.
examples.output: A Ford RAM insured vehicle was stolen from a secure parking lot in Boston on December 2nd, 2022, despite taking necessary precautions, and the insured is filing a comprehensive insurance claim for the stolen vehicle, its estimated value, accessories, and personal belongings inside.

examples.input: The insured vehicle, a Tesla model X, was vandalized on march 23rd while parked in front of the insured's residence on Magador Street. The vandalism included scratched paint, broken windows, and damage to the side mirrors. The insured promptly reported the incident to the police and obtained a police report. The insured is filing a claim for the repairs and any necessary replacement parts. The estimated cost of repairs has been assessed by a reputable auto repair shop.
examples.output: A Tesla Model X insured vehicle was vandalized on March 23rd, with damage including scratched paint, broken windows, and damaged side mirrors while parked in front of the insured's residence on Magador Street. The insured reported the incident to the police, obtained a police report, and is filing a claim for repairs and necessary replacement parts based on the assessed cost by a reputable auto repair shop.

examples.input: The insured vehicle, was parked outside during a severe hailstorm. As a result, the vehicle suffered extensive hail damage, including dents on the roof, hood, and trunk. The insured promptly reported the incident and is filing a claim for the necessary repairs. The estimated cost of repairs has been assessed by an authorized auto repair shop.
examples.output: Insured vehicle sustained extensive hail damage while parked outside during a severe hailstorm, prompting a claim for necessary repairs with an assessed cost by an authorized auto repair shop.

examples.input: While driving on Anthony Street on 1st June, the insured vehicle, a BMW Q1, collided with a large animal (e.g., deer) that suddenly crossed the road. The accident resulted in damage to the front bumper, grille, and headlights. The insured promptly reported the incident and is filing a claim for the repairs. Additionally, the insured sought medical attention for any potential injuries resulting from the collision.
examples.output: Insured BMW Q1 collided with a large animal on Anthony Street, resulting in damage to the front bumper, grille, and headlights. Claim filed for repairs, and insured sought medical attention for potential injuries.

examples.input: The insured vehicle, caught fire on april 1st due to a mechanical malfunction. The fire resulted in significant damage to the vehicle, including damage to the engine, interior, and exterior. The insured immediately contacted the fire department, and the incident was reported to the police. The insured is filing a claim for the repairs and is providing the fire department report as evidence of the fire incident.
examples.output: Insured vehicle caught fire on April 1st due to a mechanical malfunction, resulting in significant damage to the engine, interior, and exterior. Claim filed for repairs, supported by fire department report as evidence.

The insured driver, John, was driving within the speed limit and following all traffic rules.  2. Provide any paperwork required to substantiate the claim.

 When all parties have agreed on a settlement, the claim is closed.

examples.output:
1. Contact the police to file a police report. 
 2. Provide the insurance company with the police report. 
 3. Provide the insurance company with any additional information that may be necessary to process the claim. 
 4. Wait for the insurance company to contact you regarding the claim.

examples.input: The insured vehicle, a Tesla model X, was vandalized on March 23rd, 2023 while parked in front of the insured's residence on Magador Street. The vandalism included scratched paint, broken windows, and damage to the side mirrors. The insured promptly reported the incident to the police and obtained a police report. The insured is filing a claim for the repairs and any necessary replacement parts. The estimated cost of repairs has been assessed by a reputable auto repair shop.
examples.output:
1. Verify the insured's policy coverage to ensure that it includes coverage for vandalism and the necessary repairs. 
 2. Review the provided information regarding the vandalism incident, including the date of occurrence, location (Magador Street), and a description of the damages. 
 3. Request the insured to provide the police report documenting the vandalism incident. The police report will serve as crucial evidence and help establish the validity of the claim.
 4. Engage a reputable auto repair shop to assess the damages and provide an estimate for the necessary repairs and replacement parts. Consider obtaining multiple estimates to ensure accuracy and fairness.
 5. Carefully review all supporting documents, including the police report and the repair shop's estimate. Verify the estimated cost of repairs and validate that the damages align with the incident described by the insured. 
 6. Maintain regular communication with the insured, providing updates on the claim process and addressing any questions or concerns they may have. Keep them informed about the progress and expected timeline for claim resolution.

examples.input: The insured vehicle, was parked outside during a severe hailstorm. As a result, the vehicle suffered extensive hail damage, including dents on the roof, hood, and trunk. The insured promptly reported the incident and is filing a claim for the necessary repairs. The estimated cost of repairs has been assessed by an authorized auto repair shop.
examples.output:
1. Gather missing details like, Car Make and Model, where the car had been parked and location or street details. 
 2. Verify the insured's policy coverage to ensure that it includes coverage for hail damage and the necessary repairs. 
 3. Assess the information provided about the hail damage incident. Take note of the extent of the damage, including dents on the roof, hood, and trunk of the insured vehicle. Determine if there are any other damages caused by the hailstorm.
 4. Engage an authorized auto repair shop to assess the extent of the hail damage and provide an estimate for the necessary repairs. 
 5. Carefully review the estimate provided by the authorized auto repair shop. Verify that the estimated cost of repairs is reasonable and necessary for restoring the vehicle to its pre-damage condition. 
 6. Maintain communication with the insured, keeping them informed about the claim process and any required steps.

IT Incident assist (EN).name: IT Incident assist
inputs:
Date: September 5, 2023
Time: 8:45 AM - 12:30 PM
Location: Data Center Facility

Incident Details:

    At 8:45 AM, a sudden power outage occurred in the data center, affecting all servers, networking equipment, and storage systems.
    The incident was caused by a fault in the electrical grid, resulting in a complete loss of power to the facility.
    As a result of the power outage, all hosted applications, websites, and online services became inaccessible.

Impact Assessment:

    The power outage caused a significant disruption to business operations, resulting in a loss of productivity and potential revenue.
    Customer access to online services was severely impacted, leading to dissatisfaction and potential reputation damage.
    No data loss or hardware damage occurred during the incident.

Root Cause Analysis:

    The root cause of the incident was determined to be an external electrical grid failure, which led to a complete loss of power to the data center.
    The electrical grid failure was caused by a severe storm that damaged power lines in the vicinity.

Date: June 15, 2023
Time: 10:30 AM - 12:00 PM
Location: Office Building

Incident Details:

    At 10:30 AM, users reported experiencing intermittent connectivity issues.
    IT team identified the problem to be a network hardware failure that caused a cascading impact on multiple systems.
    The incident affected all departments across the organization, resulting in a complete loss of productivity.
    Attempts were made to troubleshoot and resolve the issue internally but were unsuccessful.

Impact Assessment:

    The system outage resulted in a significant disruption of business operations, causing a loss of productivity and revenue.
    Customer service was severely impacted, leading to dissatisfaction and potential reputation damage.
    Data loss or corruption did not occur during the incident.

Root Cause Analysis:

    The root cause of the incident was identified as a hardware failure in the network switch that caused network congestion and subsequent system failures.
    The failure was attributed to a manufacturing defect in the hardware component.

Date: July 10, 2023
Time: 2:00 PM - 4:30 PM
Location: Virtual Meeting

Incident Details:

    On July 10, 2023, the IT security team detected anomalous activities indicating a potential security breach.
    Investigation revealed that a hacker gained unauthorized access to the customer database by exploiting a vulnerability in the system.
    The breach affected approximately 50,000 customer records, including personally identifiable information (PII) such as names, addresses, and email addresses.
    The incident occurred due to a misconfigured firewall rule that allowed unauthorized access to the database server.

Impact Assessment:

    The security breach resulted in potential exposure of sensitive customer data, leading to concerns over privacy and identity theft.
    Reputation damage and loss of customer trust were identified as significant impacts.
    No evidence of financial data or credit card information being compromised was found during the investigation.

Root Cause Analysis:

    The root cause of the incident was traced back to a misconfigured firewall rule that allowed unauthorized access to the database server.
    The misconfiguration occurred during a recent system update, which inadvertently altered the firewall settings.

instruction.detailed: Please recommend the responses and actions to be taken for the following
instruction.summarized: Please recommend the responses and actions to be taken for the following

examples.input:
Date: June 15, 2023
Time: 10:30 AM - 12:00 PM
Location: Office Building

Incident Details:

    At 10:30 AM, users reported experiencing intermittent connectivity issues.
    IT team identified the problem to be a network hardware failure that caused a cascading impact on multiple systems.
    The incident affected all departments across the organization, resulting in a complete loss of productivity.
    Attempts were made to troubleshoot and resolve the issue internally but were unsuccessful.

Impact Assessment:

    The system outage resulted in a significant disruption of business operations, causing a loss of productivity and revenue.
    Customer service was severely impacted, leading to dissatisfaction and potential reputation damage.
    Data loss or corruption did not occur during the incident.

Root Cause Analysis:

    The root cause of the incident was identified as a hardware failure in the network switch that caused network congestion and subsequent system failures.
    The failure was attributed to a manufacturing defect in the hardware component.
examples.output:
Response and Actions Taken:

The IT team immediately initiated the incident response process and formed a cross-functional team to address the situation.
    External support from the network hardware vendor was engaged to expedite the troubleshooting process.
    A temporary workaround was implemented to restore partial system functionality and provide limited access to critical applications.
    Regular communication updates were provided to users and stakeholders regarding the progress of the resolution efforts.

examples.input:
Date: July 10, 2023
Time: 2:00 PM - 4:30 PM
Location: Virtual Meeting

Incident Details:

    On July 10, 2023, the IT security team detected anomalous activities indicating a potential security breach.
    Investigation revealed that a hacker gained unauthorized access to the customer database by exploiting a vulnerability in the system.
    The breach affected approximately 50,000 customer records, including personally identifiable information (PII) such as names, addresses, and email addresses.
    The incident occurred due to a misconfigured firewall rule that allowed unauthorized access to the database server.

Impact Assessment:

    The security breach resulted in potential exposure of sensitive customer data, leading to concerns over privacy and identity theft.
    Reputation damage and loss of customer trust were identified as significant impacts.
    No evidence of financial data or credit card information being compromised was found during the investigation.

Root Cause Analysis:

    The root cause of the incident was traced back to a misconfigured firewall rule that allowed unauthorized access to the database server.
    The misconfiguration occurred during a recent system update, which inadvertently altered the firewall settings.
examples.output:
Response and Actions Taken:

The IT security team immediately activated the incident response plan and isolated the affected systems to prevent further unauthorized access.
 
External cybersecurity experts were engaged to assist in forensic analysis and identify the extent of the breach.
A notification was sent to all affected customers, informing them about the incident, potential risks, and steps to protect their personal information.
    The compromised firewall rule was promptly corrected, and additional security measures were implemented to enhance the database security.

Subject: IT System Outage Incident - Helpline Support Update

Dear [Customer/Employee Name],

We apologize for the inconvenience caused by the recent IT system outage incident on [Date]. Our team has been working diligently to restore system functionality and address the disruption.

If you require any assistance or have questions about the incident or the current status of your services, our helpline support team is available to assist you. Please contact our helpline support team at [Helpline Phone Number] or [Helpline Email Address].

We appreciate your patience and understanding during this incident. We are committed to resolving any concerns you may have and ensuring a smooth transition during the recovery process.

Thank you for your cooperation.

Sincerely,

[Your Name]
[Your Position]
[Company Name]
[Contact Information]

Subject: Security Breach Incident - Helpline Support Update

Dear [Customer/Employee Name],

We are writing to provide you with an update regarding the recent security breach incident that occurred on [Date]. We understand the concern and potential impact this incident may have caused, and we sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

Our dedicated IT security team has been working tirelessly to address the breach and mitigate any potential risks. We have taken immediate steps to enhance our security measures and protect your data.

If you have any questions or require assistance regarding the incident, your personal information, or steps to safeguard your data, our helpline support team is here to help. Please don't hesitate to reach out to our helpline support team at [Helpline Phone Number] or [Helpline Email Address].

We want to assure you that protecting your privacy and maintaining the security of your information is of utmost importance to us. We are committed to resolving any concerns you may have and providing the necessary support during this challenging time.

Thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident. We are actively working to strengthen our security measures and prevent similar incidents in the future.

Sincerely,

[Your Name]
[Your Position]
[Company Name]
[Contact Information]

Casey Hall

916-566-6124

Current role: Airfield Operations Specialist

instruction.detailed: Read this Resume and extract the Name, the Email, the Degree, the Latest job title and the Latest employer . If you don't find these details in the Resume, fill it as Not Found.
instruction.summarized: Read this Resume and extract the Name, the Email, the Degree, the Latest job title and the Latest employer . If you don't find these details in the Resume, fill it as Not Found.

examples.input:
Rosie Miller
Pittsburgh, PA 15201
(555) 555-5555
rosie.miller@msn.com

PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
Experienced Restaurant Manager bringing demonstrated success in developing and motivating strong restaurant teams capable of handling over 200 customers hourly. Keeps all areas clean and sanitized while managing inventory and preventing waste. Consistent career history of operations improvement, team building and revenue increases.

WORK HISTORY
March 2014 to Current
Outback Steakhouse – Pittsburgh, PA
Restaurant Manager
* Reduced labor costs by 17% percent while maintaining excellent service and profit levels
Managed a 7-person team of cooks and back of house staff and a team of 8 front house staff for a busy steakhouse restaurant
* Continuously evaluated business operations to effectively align workflows for optimal area coverage increasing customer satisfaction rating by 80%

December 2010 to February 2014
TGI Fridays – Pittsburgh, PA Assistant
Restaurant Manager
* Reduced restaurant's annual food and labor costs by 15% through proper budgeting, scheduling and management of inventory
* Kept restaurant compliant with all federal, state and local hygiene and food safety regulations which kept food safety score between 95-100 every inspection
* Coordinated kitchen stations with managers to cut down on customer wait times by 50%

July 2007 to November 2010
BJ's Restaurants, Inc – Pittsburgh, PA
Restaurant Team Leader
* Assisted customers in placing special orders for large-scale events such as corporate events and birthday parties
* Recruited and hired over 10 employees offering talent, charisma and experience to restaurant team
Pitched in to help host, waitstaff and bussers during exceptionally busy times such as dinner hour

SKILLS
Conflict resolution techniques
Performance improvement
Staff management
Service-oriented
Trained in performance and wage reviews
Business operations
Inventory control and record keeping
Marketing and advertising

EDUCATION
Park Point University Pittsburgh, PA
Bachelor of Arts Hospitality Management

Email: rosie.miller@msn.com
Degree: Bachelor of Arts Hospitality Management
Latest job title: Restaurant Manager
Latest Employer: Outback Steakhouse

Customer Airport Review (EN).name: Customer Airport Review
inputs:
Andy:
Excellent and well maintained. Highly organized and efficient. Handles the traffic so well even at this time of the year when there is a huge influx of international students coming to start their Universities in Vancouver. Plenty of taxi services available just outside the airport.  Extremely helpful staff.

Chris Martin:
More than 50% of the flights into and out of the YVR are delayed, security staff aka curbside operations specifically the ones who deal with the parking matters are rude, the bathrooms are most of the time dirty.

Joey:
A very comfortable airport to wait for one's flight. Comfy seats and various seating arrangements around artistic energies including a Bill Reid sculpture and other water features and sculptures. There are food stores and retail stores. It feels almost like a shopping mall rather than an airport which is very nice. Probably could do with more charging stations near seating areas.

instruction.detailed: Categorize the review as positive, negative or mixed and summaries key points.
instruction.summarized: Categorize the review as positive, negative or mixed and summaries key points.

examples.input:
The design of the airport is nice, with natural light falling in making it very bright and cosy. Shops and cafes are very well organized. Water fountains are outside bathrooms, very easy to access. Bathrooms are clean and there's one compartment that is big enough for a trolley to get in. Very convenient. 
I deducted one star for the rude behaviors that I encountered at the security check. The staff's instructions were unclear, and she was not helpful at all. I think one shouldn't expect friendly behaviors at security checks in North America, as my past travel experiences told.
examples.output:
Mixed Review
- Good layout
- Rude, unhelpful staff

examples.input:
I am delighted to share my positive experience with Vancouver International Airport, as my friend had the opportunity to work there in the past. The airport, renowned for its exceptional facilities and services, truly sets the bar high when it comes to creating a seamless travel experience.
During my visits to the airport, I was impressed by the overall organization and efficiency demonstrated by the staff. The dedication and professionalism exhibited by my friend and their colleagues were truly commendable. Their commitment to ensuring the safety and comfort of passengers was evident in every interaction.
Vancouver International Airport's commitment to customer service was truly outstanding. From the friendly and helpful airport personnel to the smooth and streamlined processes, it was evident that they prioritize the needs and satisfaction of travelers. The airport's clean and well-maintained environment further added to the overall positive experience.
Moreover, the airport's range of amenities and services catered to the diverse needs of passengers. From a wide selection of dining options to convenient transportation facilities, Vancouver International Airport truly excels in providing a world-class travel experience.
I would like to extend my heartfelt appreciation to Vancouver International Airport for maintaining such high standards of excellence. It is a testament to the dedicated team behind the scenes, including my friend, who contributed to making the airport a success. I wholeheartedly recommend Vancouver International Airport to anyone seeking a pleasant and hassle-free travel experience.
examples.output:
Positive Review
- Good facilities and amenities 
- Nice customer service
- Good environment

examples.input:
What a shame.
Whoever planned a construction on a Friday before a long weekend needs some attention and thorough understanding of the situation. It took a while to get a cab after a considerable duration of waiting. Rideshare was the same. No car arrived.
Why did you decide to block the whole lanes except for one when you know you would have a lot of travelers?
examples.output:
Negative Review
- Poor planning of construction activities
- Long wait for taxi and rideshare
- Frustrating experience

examples.input:
Flew to here as airline crew after a 12-hour flight, physically already tired enough when arrived. Witnessing one crew of our team got baggage spot check for almost 1 hour.
Heard that was just for a training procedure for a junior customs officer! (Not sure. Just heard about it.)
We couldn’t leave our colleague behind at the airport before heading to the hotel.
But we are so exhausted, needed to rest right away! All we could do was just wait.
Can the customs authority give some humanity to us?
We respect all of your work.
But please finish the baggage check work with a timely manner as we also deserve some respect as well!
examples.output:
Negative Review
- Long wait for baggage spot check
- Lack of empathy and respect for airline crew
- Inhumane treatment

examples.input: The airport is nice. It is significantly understaffed though. The airlines are super slow with large lines. The distance to certain gates may be close to one mile. Otherwise, nice and dried atmosphere
examples.output:
Mixed Review
- Nice airport
- Understaffed
- Slow lines
- Long distance to certain gates

examples.input:
Flew to here as airline crew after a 12-hour flight, physically already tired enough when arrived. Witnessing one crew of our team got baggage spot check for almost 1 hour.
Heard that was just for a training procedure for a junior customs officer! (Not sure. Just heard about it.)
We couldn’t leave our colleague behind in the airport before heading to the hotel.
But we are so exhausted, needed to rest right away! All we could do was just wait.
Can the custom authority give some humanity to us?
We respect all of your work.
But please finish the baggage check work with a timely manner as we also deserve some respect as well!
examples.output:
Negative Review
- Long wait for baggage spot check
- Lack of empathy and respect for airline crew
- Inhumane treatment

examples.input: Signage was not good. Had to ask where toilets were, then blundered into a lounge when I wanted my departure gate. Otherwise  quite good access to departure gates
examples.output:
Mixed Review
- Poor signage
- Confusing layout
- Good access to departure gates

examples.input: It's a big airport so you have to keep walking and make sure you follow the signs. The security lines can be long but at least they move at a reasonable speed. Food choices are ok. Parking is very confusing. If someone comes to pick you up, it is a struggle to meet up, so make sure you can make a phone call to figure out who is where.
examples.output:
Mixed Review
- Big airport, long walks
- Long Security lines
- Ok food choices
- Confusing parking

instruction.detailed: Generate a response to the review left by travellers of Vancouver International airport.
instruction.summarized: Generate a response to the review left by travellers of Vancouver International airport.

examples.input:
Tara Elizabeth:
Parking was easy to do, and the signage made it clear to us where to go for check-in for the flight. I was sending off my teenage children, and the Air Canada staff was really helpful.
examples.output:
Hi Tara!
We're glad to hear you and your children had a great experience!

examples.input:
Daniel Xu:
So modern! Very clean and great atmosphere.
examples.output:
Hi Daniel!
Thank you for the review, we're happy you enjoyed your visit!

examples.input:
C. Nazima London:
I have a disabled child who uses an AAC Tobi Dynavox to speak.
We have traveled almost all of the United States where my child was born and NEVER has TSA taken her AAC away from her to screen it.
My child was screaming and was told that she had to give it up if she wanted to go home.
That's ridiculous no one should ever be treated that way. This AAC is her voice how dare they do that.
We had a late evening flight on 8/9/23. My child cried and cried she could not understand why they would take her voice away.
The supervisor said to me that it's not attached to her so it has to go through the screening, then after it went through they kept it from her while they patted her down, she had no way of telling them if they were hurting her or embarrassingly her.
My advice to all parents or persons who use a speech device DO NOT FLY TO CANADA, they have the most horrible people at the TSA.
We will never be able to see our elderly family who resides in Canada.
Someone needs to fix this now!!!
examples.output:
Hi Nazima,
We're terribly sorry you had to go through this. We will investigate this issue immediately.

examples.input:
Reg Natarajan:
I'm prejudiced as it's my home port, but YVR really is the best airport in the world.
examples.output:
Hi Reg!
We're happy to hear you had a great time!

examples.input:
SANJEEV JAIN:
This one is while you move towards concourse D. Lounge is well maintained and has ample seating area.
Not much to eat, the basic stuff and tea/coffee. Options are very limited. Self-service lounge.
examples.output:
Hi Sanjeev!
Thank you for your feedback, we'll look into expanding the food options in the lounge.

examples.input:
Sharon Doyle:
There are not enough cafes, especially breakfast places in this airport. There was a cafe near our gate that looked like it was shut down permanently. It was dark, the gates were down and locked and if you peered through the locked gates, it looked like they were storing a lot of stuff inside in there. I walked around a long time looking for something to eat for breakfast and finally decided to wait in a really long line for well over 20 minutes at a Tim Horton’s. I got a muffin and juice. I spoke to several other people in the airport that shared my opinion of not enough breakfast cafes. We were all frustrated.
examples.output:
Hi Sharon!
We're sorry to hear you had trouble finding a place to eat breakfast. We'll look into adding more breakfast options in the future.

examples.input:
DS C:
What a shame.
Whoever planned a construction on a Friday before a long weekend needs some attention and thorough understanding of the situation. It took a while to get a cab after a considerable duration of waiting. Rideshare was the same. No car arrived.
Why did you decide to block the whole lanes except for one when you know you would have a lot of travelers?
examples.output:
Hi DS C,
We apologize for the inconvenience caused by the construction. We understand that it was a busy time and we'll look into ways to minimize the impact of future construction projects.

examples.input:
Wareef Kabbani:
The airport is nice. It is significantly understaffed though. The airlines are super slow with large lines. The distance to certain gates may be close to one mile. Otherwise, nice and dry atmosphere.
examples.output:
Hi Wareef!
Thank you for your feedback. We'll look into adding more staff to improve the efficiency of check-in and reducing wait times.

examples.input:
Cheekeye the-dog:
Worst airport in the world
Be there 2 hours on top of what they recommend.
89% chance they will lose your luggage so pack AirTags
They do have a purebred, so at least you won’t be left with a bad taste in your mouth even though it’s the worst airport in the world.
examples.output:
Hi Cheekeye,
We're sorry to hear you had a negative experience. We'll do our best to improve our services and minimize the risk of lost luggage. Thank you for the feedback.

examples.input:
Wajahat Faiz:
THIS AIRPORT HAS NOT ONE TIM HORTONS BUT TWO TIM HORTONS
examples.output:
Hi Wajahat!
We're glad you're excited about the Tim Hortons! We'll make sure to keep them open and ready for your next visit.

examples.input:
Michael Smith:
Supposed one of the best airports in Canada. I wouldn't rate this with 3rd world airports. Amenities after 2100hrs are next to nonexistent. Impossible to find a beer or wine. If you like fast food and coffee, you're in luck with 4 locations open in the food court. Staff was pleasant but all airline counters were empty of staff. If it wasn't for the fact of being the only gateway to the east in Canada, I'd definitely avoid it.
examples.output:
Hi Michael,
We're sorry to hear you didn't have a positive experience. We'll look into adding more amenities and extending the hours of operation for food and beverage options. Thank you for your feedback.
